forum.content:
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=vNsgkTAzT6s

You've always been here for me From the very start
You've held me in your safe arms
You've held me in your heart

And I love you Mom

A mom's life isn't easy and it's not always fun
But I'd be lost without you I'm so grateful for all you've done

And I love you Mom
I love you Mom

Sometimes I take for granted
The gift to me you are
I don't always show it
But in my heart you're never far

And I love you Mom
I love you Mom
I love you Mom
I love you Mom
forum.title: A Song For Mom
